translations.chinese: 高祖，沛豐邑中陽里人也，姓劉氏。
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu was born in Zhongyang Village in the town of Fengyi, Pei County. His surname was Liu.

context.next: 母媼嘗息大澤之陂，夢與神遇。

translations.chinese: 母媼嘗息大澤之陂，夢與神遇。
translations.english: Once, while resting by the dike of a vast marsh, his mother dreamed that she encountered a divine being.

context.previous: 高祖，沛豐邑中陽里人也，姓劉氏。
context.next: 是時雷電晦冥，父太公往視，則見交龍於上。

translations.chinese: 是時雷電晦冥，父太公往視，則見交龍於上。
translations.english: At that moment, thunder crashed and darkness fell. His father, Taigong, went to investigate and saw two dragons entwined in the sky above.

context.previous: 母媼嘗息大澤之陂，夢與神遇。
context.next: 已而有娠，遂產高祖。

translations.chinese: 已而有娠，遂產高祖。
translations.english: Soon after, she became pregnant and gave birth to Emperor Gaozu.

context.previous: 是時雷電晦冥，父太公往視，則見交龍於上。

translations.chinese: 高祖為人，隆準而龍顏，美須髯，左股有七十二黑子。
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu had a prominent nose, a face like a dragon, beautiful whiskers and beard, and seventy-two black moles on his left thigh.

context.next: 寬仁愛人，意豁如也。

translations.chinese: 寬仁愛人，意豁如也。
translations.english: He was generous, benevolent, and loved people. His mind was open and magnanimous.

context.previous: 高祖為人，隆準而龍顏，美須髯，左股有七十二黑子。
context.next: 常有大度，不事家人生產作 業。

translations.chinese: 常有大度，不事家人生產作 業。
translations.english: He always showed great magnanimity and never concerned himself with the family's farming and business.

context.previous: 寬仁愛人，意豁如也。
context.next: 及壯，試吏，為泗上亭長，廷中吏無所不狎侮。

translations.chinese: 及壯，試吏，為泗上亭長，廷中吏無所不狎侮。
translations.english: As a young man, he took up an official position and became the local magistrate of Sishang Pavilion. He treated all the court officials with casual familiarity, even insulting them.

context.previous: 常有大度，不事家人生產作 業。
context.next: 好酒及色。

translations.chinese: 好酒及色。
translations.english: He enjoyed drinking wine and romantic pursuits.

context.previous: 及壯，試吏，為泗上亭長，廷中吏無所不狎侮。
context.next: 常從王媼、武負貰酒，時飲醉臥，武負、王媼見其上常有怪。

translations.chinese: 常從王媼、武負貰酒，時飲醉臥，武負、王媼見其上常有怪。
translations.english: He often went with Wang Po and Wu Fu to borrow wine. Sometimes he drank until he passed out. Wu Fu and Wang Po noticed that strange phenomena often appeared above him.

context.previous: 好酒及色。
context.next: 高祖每酤留飲，酒讎數倍。

translations.chinese: 高祖每酤留飲，酒讎數倍。
translations.english: Whenever Emperor Gaozu bought wine, he stayed to drink, and the bill was several times higher.

context.previous: 常從王媼、武負貰酒，時飲醉臥，武負、王媼見其上常有怪。
context.next: 及見怪，歲 竟，此兩家常折券棄責。

translations.chinese: 及見怪，歲 竟，此兩家常折券棄責。
translations.english: Whenever something strange happened around him, the year would end with these two families tearing up contracts and forgiving debts.

context.previous: 高祖每酤留飲，酒讎數倍。

translations.chinese: 高祖常繇咸陽，縱觀秦皇帝，喟然大息，曰：「嗟乎，大丈夫當如此矣！」
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu often passed through Xianyang and gazed upon the Qin emperor. He would sigh deeply and say: "Ah, this is how a true man should live!"

translations.chinese: 單父人呂公善沛令，辟仇，從之客，因家焉。
translations.english: Lü Gong from Shanfu was on good terms with the magistrate of Pei. To avoid his enemies, he became the magistrate's guest and settled his family there.

context.next: 沛中豪傑吏聞令有重客，皆往賀。

translations.chinese: 沛中豪傑吏聞令有重客，皆往賀。
translations.english: When the influential officials and clerks of Pei heard that the magistrate had an important guest, they all came to offer congratulations.

context.previous: 單父人呂公善沛令，辟仇，從之客，因家焉。
context.next: 蕭何為主吏，主進，令諸 大夫曰：「進不滿千錢，坐之堂下。」

translations.chinese: 蕭何為主吏，主進，令諸 大夫曰：「進不滿千錢，坐之堂下。」
translations.english: Xiao He served as chief clerk and was in charge of receiving guests. He instructed the other officials: "Those who present less than one thousand cash should be seated below the hall."

context.previous: 沛中豪傑吏聞令有重客，皆往賀。
context.next: 高祖為亭長，素易諸吏，乃紿為謁曰「賀錢萬」，實不持一錢。

translations.chinese: 高祖為亭長，素易諸吏，乃紿為謁曰「賀錢萬」，實不持一錢。
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu was the local magistrate and usually treated officials casually. So he tricked them by having the announcement read "Congratulatory money: ten thousand cash," but in reality he didn't bring a single coin.

context.previous: 蕭何為主吏，主進，令諸 大夫曰：「進不滿千錢，坐之堂下。」
context.next: 謁入，呂公大驚，起，迎之門。

translations.chinese: 謁入，呂公大驚，起，迎之門。
translations.english: When the announcement was read, Lü Gong was greatly startled. He rose and went out to welcome him at the gate.

context.previous: 高祖為亭長，素易諸吏，乃紿為謁曰「賀錢萬」，實不持一錢。
context.next: 呂公者，好相人，見高祖狀 貌，因重敬之，引入坐上坐。

translations.chinese: 呂公者，好相人，見高祖狀 貌，因重敬之，引入坐上坐。
translations.english: Lü Gong was skilled in reading faces. When he saw Emperor Gaozu's appearance, he was greatly impressed and led him inside to be seated in the place of honor.

context.previous: 謁入，呂公大驚，起，迎之門。
context.next: 蕭何曰：「劉季固多大言，少成事。」

translations.chinese: 蕭何曰：「劉季固多大言，少成事。」
translations.english: Xiao He said: "Liu Ji certainly talks big but accomplishes little."

context.previous: 呂公者，好相人，見高祖狀 貌，因重敬之，引入坐上坐。
context.next: 高祖因狎侮諸客，遂坐上坐，無所詘。

translations.chinese: 高祖因狎侮諸客，遂坐上坐，無所詘。
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu took advantage of this to treat all the guests with casual familiarity and even insult them. He sat in the place of honor without showing any humility.

context.previous: 蕭何曰：「劉季固多大言，少成事。」
context.next: 酒闌，呂公因目固留高祖。

translations.chinese: 酒闌，呂公因目固留高祖。
translations.english: As the banquet ended, Lü Gong signaled insistently to keep Emperor Gaozu there.

context.previous: 高祖因狎侮諸客，遂坐上坐，無所詘。
context.next: 竟酒，後。

translations.chinese: 竟酒，後。
translations.english: After the banquet ended.

context.previous: 酒闌，呂公因目固留高祖。
context.next: 呂公曰：「臣少好 相人，相人多矣，無如季相，願季自愛。

translations.chinese: 呂公曰：「臣少好 相人，相人多矣，無如季相，願季自愛。
translations.english: Lü Gong said: "Since I was young, I've enjoyed reading faces. I've read many people's faces, but none compare to Ji's. I hope Ji takes good care of himself.

context.previous: 竟酒，後。
context.next: 臣有息女，願為箕帚妾。」

translations.chinese: 臣有息女，願為箕帚妾。」
translations.english: I have a young daughter and wish to make her Ji's humble servant."

context.previous: 呂公曰：「臣少好 相人，相人多矣，無如季相，願季自愛。
context.next: 酒罷，呂媼怒呂公曰：「公始常欲奇此女，與貴人。

translations.chinese: 酒罷，呂媼怒呂公曰：「公始常欲奇此女，與貴人。
translations.english: After the wine ended, Lü Po angrily confronted Lü Gong: "You always said this daughter was exceptional and should marry someone noble.

context.previous: 臣有息女，願為箕帚妾。」
context.next: 沛令善公，求之不與，何自妄許與劉季？」

translations.chinese: 沛令善公，求之不與，何自妄許與劉季？」
translations.english: The magistrate of Pei was your friend and asked for her, but you wouldn't give her. Why are you now rashly promising her to Liu Ji?"

context.previous: 酒罷，呂媼怒呂公曰：「公始常欲奇此女，與貴人。
context.next: 呂公曰：「此非兒女子所知。」

translations.chinese: 呂公曰：「此非兒女子所知。」
translations.english: Lü Gong replied: "This is not something that mere children and women can understand."

context.previous: 沛令善公，求之不與，何自妄許與劉季？」
context.next: 卒與高祖。

translations.chinese: 卒與高祖。
translations.english: In the end, she married Emperor Gaozu.

context.previous: 呂公曰：「此非兒女子所知。」
context.next: 呂公女即呂后也，生孝惠帝、魯元公主。

translations.chinese: 呂公女即呂后也，生孝惠帝、魯元公主。
translations.english: This daughter of Lü Gong would become Empress Lü. She gave birth to Emperor Xiaohui and Princess Lu Yuan.

context.previous: 卒與高祖。

translations.chinese: 高祖嘗告歸之田。
translations.english: Once, Emperor Gaozu requested leave to return to his fields.

context.next: 呂后與兩子居田中，有一老父過請飲，呂后因餔之。

translations.chinese: 呂后與兩子居田中，有一老父過請飲，呂后因餔之。
translations.english: Empress Lü lived in the countryside with their two children. An old man passed by and asked for a drink. Empress Lü fed him.

context.previous: 高祖嘗告歸之田。
context.next: 老父相后曰：「夫人天下貴人 也。」

translations.chinese: 老父相后曰：「夫人天下貴人 也。」
translations.english: The old man read Empress Lü's face and said: "Madame, you are a noble person of the world."

context.previous: 呂后與兩子居田中，有一老父過請飲，呂后因餔之。
context.next: 令相兩子，見孝惠帝，曰：「夫人所以貴者，乃此男也。」

translations.chinese: 令相兩子，見孝惠帝，曰：「夫人所以貴者，乃此男也。」
translations.english: He had him read the faces of the two children. When he saw Emperor Xiaohui, he said: "Madame's nobility comes from this male child."

context.previous: 老父相后曰：「夫人天下貴人 也。」
context.next: 相魯元公主，亦皆貴。

translations.chinese: 相魯元公主，亦皆貴。
translations.english: He read Princess Lu Yuan's face as well - all were noble.

context.previous: 令相兩子，見孝惠帝，曰：「夫人所以貴者，乃此男也。」
context.next: 老父已去，高祖適從旁舍來，呂后具言客有過，相我子母皆大貴。
